title: Faramir, Son of Denethor (4C117)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Companion • Man
Strength:	7
Vitality:	3
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Frodo
Game Text:	Ring-bound. Ranger. An opponent may not play skirmish events or use skirmish special abilities during skirmishes involving Faramir.
Lore:	“He could see Faramir's face, which was now unmasked; it was stern and commanding, and a keen wit lay behind his searching glance.”
Rarity:	C
